title: Mayfair
description: Tomorrow morning you head to Mayfair to explore the origin of the misterious letter. By 8:55 you're in Mayfair to take a stroll. The neighbourhood looks affluent. If the letter is a prank, you don't see the pint. If it is authentic, the client certainly an afford to hire you.

options.title: Go to number 18 and ring the bell
